analysis.description:
BlockHashRNG.saveRN (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1220-1244) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.send(rewardToSend) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1237-1238)

Reentrancy in KlerosLiquid.execute (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1849-1928):
	External calls:
	- pinakion.transfer(vote.account,tokenReward) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1879)
	- pinakion.transferFrom(vote.account,this,penalty) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1891-1892)
	- pinakion.balanceOf(vote.account) < jurors[vote.account].stakedTokens || ! vote.voted (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1902-1909)
	- _setStake(vote.account,jurors[vote.account].subcourtIDs[j],0) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1904-1909)
	- dispute.tokensAtStakePerJuror[_appeal] > pinakion.balanceOf(vote.account) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1888-1891)
	- penalty = pinakion.balanceOf(vote.account) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1888-1891)
	External calls sending eth:
	- vote.account.send(ETHReward) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1880)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- disputes (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1921-1922)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#335-336) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#433-470)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#548-569)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#645-655)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#666-677)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#741-749) is declared view but contains assembly code
KlerosLiquid.extraDataToSubcourtIDAndMinJurors (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#2170-2186) is declared view but contains assembly code
KlerosLiquid.accountAndSubcourtIDToStakePathID (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#2193-2208) is declared view but contains assembly code
KlerosLiquid.stakePathIDToAccountAndSubcourtID (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#2214-2224) is declared view but contains assembly code

KlerosLiquid.onlyDuringPeriod (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1437-1441) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(disputes[_disputeID].period == _period)
	- require(bool)(disputes[_disputeID].period == _period)

Reentrancy in KlerosLiquid._setStake (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#2113-2159):
	External calls:
	- ! (_stake == 0 || pinakion.balanceOf(_account) >= newTotalStake) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#2135-2137)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- jurors (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#2140)
	- jurors (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#2143-2144)
	- jurors (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#2144-2145)

	- dispute.tokensAtStakePerJuror[_appeal] > pinakion.balanceOf(vote.account) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1888-1891)
	- penalty = pinakion.balanceOf(vote.account) (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1888-1891)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- jurors (/unique_chucks/34/0x395df49c20e34a7ea995cbf546e54f66172992ea.sol#1904-1909)
